resources.string: 1. Click the target circle with RED color.
2. You have five hearts,and no heart means game over.
3. All circles will disappear, missing means lost one heart.
1. You can control the biggest ball.
2. You should try your best to avoid the other ball, or will lose heart.
3. You have five hearts,and no heart means game over.
5. More and more target will appear, try your best
4. Everytime touch a target, you will become bigger.
